summary: The outlaws of the Clanton and Younger gangs are the heroes of this fictionalized biography.
cast: Robert Ryan|Claire Trevor|Jack Buetel|Robert Preston|Walter Brennan|Bruce Cabot|John Archer|Lawrence Tierney|Barton MacLane|Tom Tyler|Robert J. Wilke|John Cliff|Lee MacGregor|Emmett Lynn|Carleton Young|Chet Brandenburg|George Bruggeman|Roy Bucko|Bill Catching|Jimmy Dime|Art Felix|Byron Foulger|Everett Glass|Al Haskell|Larry Johns|Dick Johnstone|Jack Kenny|Bob Kortman|Hank Mann|Edwin Max|David McMahon|Charles Morton|Jack Perrin|Timothy Ryan|Sam Savitsky|William Tannen|Harry Woods
title: El mejor de los malvados
